jobDescription: Requisition Number 17-0360 Post Date 2/15/2018 Title Research Scientist City Hamilton State NJ Company Medical Diagnostic Laboratories LLC DescriptionMedical Diagnostic Laboratories, LLC (MDL) is a CLIA certified clinical laboratory with multiple state licensing, specializing in state of the art, automated DNA based molecular analysis of a variety of chronic and infectious illnesses.
